message: I'm feeling generous, but I'm also aware of the inflation risk. Let's start with a fair split.
You were too generous, I'll take a bigger share this time
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share than your last offer to make it worthwhile after inflation.
You're getting desperate, but I'll still give you a chance to take it
This is my final offer. We both know the money keeps shrinking. Let's split it evenly and end this game.
